constream.label: show_old_rois
constream.description: Show already marked rois. Defaults to False.

nodes.name: Stream ROIs
nodes.description: Asks the user to mark rois on the image, once user deams done, the rois are returned

constream.label: rep
constream.description: The Representation to be cropped. Defaults to the one of the ROI.

nodes.name: Crop Image
nodes.description: Crops an Image based on a ROI

nodes.name: Predict Care
nodes.description: Use a care model and some images to generate images

instream.label: rep
instream.description: The Image where we should count cells

nodes.name: Maximum Intensity Projection
nodes.description: Projects the image onto the maximum intensity along the z axis

constream.label: min_size
constream.description: The minimum size of the particles (default: 0)

constream.label: max_size
constream.description: The maximum size of the particles (default: None)

constream.label: min_circularity
constream.description: The minimum circularity of the particles (default: 0.0)

constream.label: max_circularity
constream.description: The maximum circularity of the particles (default: 1.0)

constream.label: gaussian_blur
constream.description: Whether to apply a gaussian blur before thresholding (kernel_size=5)

nodes.name: Otsu Thresholding
nodes.description:
Binarizes the image based on a threshold, using Otsu's method
with option to guassian blur the image before, images are normalized
for each x,y slice before thresholding.

nodes.name: Open Table in Sidebar
nodes.description: Opens the table in an accessible sidebar widget.

nodes.name: Merge Tables
nodes.description: Merges a list of tables into a single table

port.label: min_size
port.description: The minimum size of the particles (default: 0) (maps to arkid-15344e96-8c52-4e5a-812a-81ffead8dc37.min_size)

port.label: max_size
port.description: The maximum size of the particles (default: None) (maps to arkid-15344e96-8c52-4e5a-812a-81ffead8dc37.max_size)

port.label: min_circularity
port.description: The minimum circularity of the particles (default: 0.0) (maps to arkid-15344e96-8c52-4e5a-812a-81ffead8dc37.min_circularity)

port.label: max_circularity
port.description: The maximum circularity of the particles (default: 1.0) (maps to arkid-15344e96-8c52-4e5a-812a-81ffead8dc37.max_circularity)
